about_the_game:
Soviet Union. 1989 year.
In the Homeland of the Revolution, the processes are "unfolding". Citizens of the USSR associate their future with an ambitious and young leader - Mikhail Gorbachev, who "opens" the Soviet Union to the world, carrying out large-scale democratic reforms. But only a few understand how this can end...
Features:
- Lead Soviet Russia, change history: pursue your independent policy or follow the instructions of the Center.
- Influence the fate of the future world order: save the mighty Soviet Union or follow the path of sovereignty and independence.
- Discover four alternative leaders of the RSFSR.
- Save Russia from collapse: put an end to separatism and the economic crisis.
- Stop Perestroika, defending the cause of Lenin, or bring reforms to the very end.
Good luck, comrade! The fate of the Motherland is in your hands!
